name: aurorafactory
description: A new Flutter project by using solidity & Aurora network runing in Ethereum chain
author: Faisal Ramdan Mulyadi

scripts.deploy:development: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='development' && truffle migrate
scripts.deploy:aurora: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='aurora' && truffle migrate --network aurora
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='goerli' && truffle migrate --network goerli
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='ropsten' && truffle migrate --network ropsten
